favourite.article: Amen!! Lord Jesus, I confess my sins! Thank You Lord that Your blood is constantly cleansing! Praise You Lord for Your precious blood!!

Oh Lord, praise You. Only You can bring me peace and joy. Only You that I can dwell forever. Only You who can cleanse my sin. I need You for every moment of my life. Oh Lord, thank You for Your mercy and grace over my life.

Amen! Oh praise Him that in Him there is no darkness at all! Oh Lord keep us walking and dwelling in You! When we are in darkness we are not in Him. Oh Lord keep us abiding in Your marvelous light. We love You Lord Jesus!
